title: Perdomo Exclusive!
itunes:title: Perdomo Exclusive!
description: Nick Perdomo and Nicolas Perdomo LIVE from Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem NH. We smoke the new, unavailable ANYWHERE, Perdomo 20th Anniversary, and 2006 Grand Gru as we celebrate Fathers Day!
